data.text: @portraitinflesh @timothy_stanley Maybe just don't set the bar so pathetically low for a world leader? He isn't a child playing first shepherd in the school play.
@jonsmalldon I don't blame @timothy_stanley, or other journalists, for not wanting to keep saying the same thing again and again. But there really is no spinning Trump.
@portraitinflesh WTF is this? He lied, he got facts wrong and dodged questions. But because he's done that before it's fine?
